name: Order from the Boss
author: a111164
description:
Angry about your ally not using burndrive to guarantee a kill? or keep his shield on even light years away from any enemy? Hold R and choose an ally as target, use Q to switch target if multiple modules overlaping. Meanwhile press W A S D to force the target to use shipsystem / vent / toggle shield / fire missile weapons.
Support keybinds with LunaSettings
